In March 2011, [[KT (telecommunication company)|KT]] from South Korea announced that they has expanded its high-speed wireless broadband network by [[4G]] [[WiBro]] cover 85 percent of the population. It is the largest broadband network covered in the world, followed by Japan and US with 70 percent and 36 percent respectively.<ref>{{cite web|title=S. Korea expands high-speed wireless coverage|url=http://news.yahoo.com/s/afp/20110302/tc_afp/skoreatelecomktsmartphones}} {{Dead link|date=August 2011}}</ref>
